pullrequest.title: Display joint type, parent link's name and child link's name on world tree -> 4.0

content.raw:
I understand that this PR is simply keeping up with the existing style, but this file contains about 35 instances of checking for _parent, and adding a property to it (or propTreeBrowser). Some of these checks look like they are not even necessary (such as when the caller is passing a pointer to a freshly created instance).

It looks like it would be best to capture this in a private method, or remove the checks for cases where _parent cannot be NULL. What do you think?
